dcterms:description: The AToMiC dataset contains around 11 million images and more than 10 million text queries collected from Wikipedia. Each text query includes four different fields, and each image comes with a multilingual caption. The dataset is used for image suggestion tasks, where textual data serves as queries to retrieve relevant images.
dcterms:title: AToMiC dataset
